name: KunKunNight
description:
What is the story content of this game?

This is a fictional story in which you will embark on a thrilling escape experience with a man named KunKun.

What is the gameplay of this game？

This is a first person horror game with both horror and comedy elements. In the game, you need to avoid Kunkun's pursuit and find a way to escape through various decryptions!
When you were found,you can evade KunKun Kun's pursuit by hiding in a specific cabinet！
The game contains several hidden exploration elements, and some of which can affect the ending.

How many endings does this game include?

This game includes 2 endings that are triggered by achieving specific conditions.

The screenshot of the game is as follows：







All content in the game is unrelated to reality, and any similarity is purely coincidental.
The game contains scare elements. If you lack courage, please exit in a timely manner.
